About Me

Get to know more about me...

BIO

I'm Tamida Rabuwa, a Web and mobile Developer with great enthusiasm for software technology. I have completed an enjoyable period of skills training and certification with Andela, IBM, Udacity, Kad ICT, and most recently "Click On-kaduna" in Collaboration with the World Bank, where i have gain considerable knowledge in web technologies and other soft skills. My core skills ranges from Wordpress, Angular Framework, Version Control(GitHub), Ionic Framework, Laravel Framework, PHP, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, Bootsrap, MySQL, Rest API, and Figma. Other soft skills include Design Thinking, Communication Skills and Team work. Having being able to balance competing priorities and work experience while still able to meet strict datelines for submission of projects and assignments has made me the go to person to add to your team or for your project.

Hard-Skills

Web Developer

Angular, Ionic, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Bootstrap, MySQL, Laravel, Version Control(Git/GitHub), Responsive Web Design, Testing/Debugging, Web UI/UX Design, SEO, Cross-Browser Compatibility.

Soft-Skills

Web Developer

Design Thinking, Written & Verbal Communication Skills, Teamwork, Adaptability, Problem Solving, Critical Observation, Time Management, Detail-Oriented, Strong Organization Skills.
